summary: Completed frontend testing of Boekhouding module redesign. All 10 features tested - pages load correctly with consistent design (4 stat cards, gray colors, rounded-2xl borders).

minor.issue: Returns 403 error - notifications endpoint not accessible (known issue from previous iterations)

issues: Still has 12 slate- color references (mostly in scanner/camera UI elements, not main design)
Has some slate- color references in icon backgrounds and table rows

critical_code_review_comments: InkoopPage.js - Fully redesigned with 4 StatCards and tabs (Inkoopfacturen, Inkooporders)
VoorraadPage.js - Has 4 StatCards but still contains some slate- colors in scanner UI elements
All main pages use consistent gray colors for primary design elements
All pages have rounded-2xl borders on cards and containers
Navigation works correctly to all boekhouding pages
context_for_next_testing_agent: Boekhouding module redesign complete. All pages have consistent design with 4 stat cards, gray colors, and rounded-2xl borders. Minor: VoorraadPage.js and DebiteruenPage.js still have some slate- color references in secondary UI elements (scanner, table rows) but main design is consistent.
